name: @microsoft/teams-app-test-tool
description: Use @microsoft/m365agentsplayground instead. This package is maintained for backward compatibility.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc -p ./ && npm run copy-client
scripts.copy-client: copyfiles -u 3 "../client/build/**/*" dist/client && copyfiles -u 2 "../server/config.json" dist/server && copyfiles -u 2 "../server/package.json" dist/server
scripts.package: rimraf dist && node --max-old-space-size=4096 ../../node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode production --config ./webpack.config.js && npm run copy-client
